item.title: Getting Started with OAuth2 in Go
item.description: This is a text version of this video: packagemain #11: Getting started with OAuth2 in Go. Getting started with OAuth2 in Go Authentication usually is very important part in any application. You can always implement your own authentication system, but it will require a lot of work, registration, forgot password form, etc. That’s why OAuth2 was created, to allow user to log in using one of the many accounts user already has.
